CAIRN.CharacterRegeneratorConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete and regenerate this character?
CAIRN.FeaturesInfo: Additional character traits with some mechanical effect.
CAIRN.Name: Name
CAIRN.OverburdenByGold: Character may be overburdened by a gold

MaxEquipSlots.label: Equipment Limit
MaxEquipSlots.hint: Maximum equipment slots for player characters, used for encumbrance tracking.

UseGoldThreshold.label: Use gold threshold
UseGoldThreshold.hint: Define number of gold pieces which occupies full inventory slot. Zero means that gold pieces are always petty.
UseGoldThreshold.message: Gold is counted as an inventory

UsePanic.label: Use panic condition
UsePanic.hint: Use 2e panic condition for player characters.

UseItemIcons.label: Show item icons
UseItemIcons.hint: Show icons for some items in inventory to quickly recognize the type.

UseCairnDiceNotation.label: Use Cairn dice notation
UseCairnDiceNotation.hint: Interpret Cairn dice notation like 'd6+d6' as described in the rules.

ShowGenerateHeader.label: Show regenerate button
ShowGenerateHeader.hint: Show 'Regenerate' button at character sheet header

ShowFeatures.label: Show features section
ShowFeatures.hint: Show additional 'feature' list in the character description tab.

ShowContainerActors.label: Show container actors
ShowContainerActors.hint: Show containers on the actor list.
